title: Software Engineer at Tech Corp
content:
Key points to remember:
- Strong background in React and Node.js
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Emphasis on team collaboration and agile methodologies
- Company culture focuses on innovation and continuous learning

title: Frontend Developer at StartupCo
content:
Interview preparation notes:
- Fast-paced startup environment
- Need to showcase portfolio projects
- Emphasis on modern frontend frameworks
- Questions about handling tight deadlines and multiple projects

title: Full Stack Developer at Enterprise Inc
content:
Important details:
- Large enterprise environment
- Focus on scalability and security
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure)
- Team lead mentioned interest in mentoring junior developers
